channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How to watch Australia vs England: live stream 2nd Ashes Test for *FREE* from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch the 2nd Ashes Test from anywhere in the world as Australia and England do battle under floodlights with the pink ball

item.title: Google’s Antigravity AI deleted a developer’s drive and then apologized
item.description: Google’s powerful new Antigravity AI coding tool mistakenly wiped a user’s hard drive, raising serious concerns about how much autonomy we give to agentic systems.
